scripts.dev: cp config_dev.js config.js && cp navigation/Screensclient.js navigation/Screens.js
scripts.zipclient: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run makeclient && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/Desktop/client_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/DriverStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "client_app.zip"   -x "driver_app.zip" -x "vendor_app.zip" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js" && npm run dev
scripts.zipdriver: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run makedriver && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/Desktop/driver_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/VendorStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "client_app.zip"   -x "driver_app.zip" -x "vendor_app.zip" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js" && npm run dev
scripts.zipvendor: npm run prepareforrelase && npm run makevendor && zip -r /Users/danieldimov/Desktop/vendor_app.zip ./ -x "node_modules/*"  -x "*.git*" -x "*.DS_Store"  -x "ios/Pods/*" -x "android/app/build/*"   -x "navigation/ClientStacks/*"  -x "navigation/DriverStacks/*"   -x "navigation/Screensclient.js"  -x "navigation/Screensdriver.js" -x "navigation/Screensvendor.js"  -x "client_app.zip"   -x "driver_app.zip" -x "vendor_app.zip" -x "config_dev.js" -x "config_release.js" && npm run dev
scripts.zipall: npm run zipclient && npm run zipdriver && npm run zipvendor
